original_text: So God let those people do all the bad things that they wanted to do. God let those disgusting things rule their lives. As a result, they did bad things with each other's bodies. They did things that people should be ashamed to do.
korean_text: 그러므로 하나님께서 그들을 마음의 정욕대로 더러움에 내버려 두사 그들의 몸을 서로 욕되게 하게 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: So God let those people do all the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님은 그 사람들이 모든 나쁜 일을 하도록 내버려 두셨습니다

sentences.original_text: God let those disgusting things rule their lives
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 역겨운 것들이 그들의 삶을 지배하게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, they did bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들은 나쁜 일들을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: that people should be ashamed to do
